channel.title: Abouts on JR's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on JR's tech blog

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Jivko Rusev (JR for short) and I am a software engineer. I am passionate about cutting-edge technologies and I like finding simple and elegant solutions to complex problems. I started this blog as a place to share my journey through the world of software.
